name: Cook the Book: Noodle Kugel
description: Kugel always had a place on the table at holiday meals while I was growing up, not only as a side dish but also as a source of entertainment. This seemingly simple casserole was an endless topic of debate. Which...
recipeIngredient: 5 ounces fine egg noodles, cooked and drained (2 cups cooked)

recipeInstructions.text: Make the topping: In a bowl, mix cornflake crumbs, sugar, and cinnamon. Set aside.
Make kugel: Grease an 8-inch-square baking pan and place noodles in the pan.
In a blender, purée eggs, cottage cheese, sour cream, sugar, butter, and vanilla. Pour over noodles and sprinkle topping over all.
Bake kugel for 1 hour or until pudding is cooked though and slightly puffy.
